You are here – the official website for Imo State College of Nursing and Midwifery Orlu, where opportunity is merged with handwork to achieve success.

Our motto: Excellence in knowledge, skills and services

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_separator color=”green” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeInRight” el_id=”f10″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Our Vision Statement: “To become a Citadel of knowledge and skills development in Nursing and Health Science Education.
Our Mission Statement: “To improve health and wellness in individuals, families and communities through training and translation of science, skill and knowledge into practice”

Successful candidates should visit the bursary unit for registration modalities before 3rd November 2023.

Note offer not accepted after 3rd November 2023 is deemed to have elapsed while lectures commences on 13th November 2023.

Also unsuccessful candidates are advised to visit the admission unit for admission into the following departments at Imo State College of Health and Management Sciences Amaigbo

1, Pharmacy

2, Medical laboratory

3, Community Health Extension Workers (chew)

4, Public Health Department

5, Environmental Health Department

6, Health Information Management

7, Nutrition and Diabetics
